name: dashboard-nbexts
description: Extensions for Jupyter / IPython Notebook to enable the authoring and deployment of dashboards from notebooks.

scripts.css: postcss --use autoprefixer $npm_package_config_css_nb_dir/*.css --dir $npm_package_config_css_nb_dir/ --config postcss-config.json && postcss --use autoprefixer $npm_package_config_css_th_dir/*.css --dir $npm_package_config_css_th_dir/ --config postcss-config.json

author: Jupyter Community
